name: Loving, But Distant
description:
Loving, But Distant

A small interactive piece about the difficulty of a long-distance relationship. Players can communicate love and support to their partner; however, the player's happiness is controlled by the reciprocation of the partner on the phone. Unhappiness and uncertainty of your partner's happiness slowly creeps as you wait for a loving response back.

Spacebar: Send Love

This game was completed in around 48 hours. All art, audio, design, and development by @grizzlypierce.
